Translations.Text: Say: "He, God, the Unique One of Absolute Unity
God, the Eternally-Besought-of-All (Himself in no need of anything)
He begets not, nor is He begotten
And comparable to Him there is none
Say: "I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak
From the evil of what He has created
And from the evil of the darkness (of night) when it overspreads
And from the evil of the witches who blow on knots (to cast a spell)
And from the evil of the envious one when he envies
Say: "I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind
From the evil of the sneaking whisperer (the Satan)
Who whispers into the hearts of humankind
